meanings.def: a person whose job is to decide how things such as clothes, furniture, tools, etc. will look or work by making drawings, plans or patterns
examples: one of the country's top fashion designers
She works as a set designer for the Royal Opera House.

meanings.def: made by a famous designer; expensive and having a famous brand name
examples: He had a trendy haircut, an earring and designer stubble (= a short beard, grown for two or three days and thought to look fashionable).
